description: This file defines routing logic for a Flutter mobile application, including route constants, argument classes, route maps, and route factory methods for navigation within the app.

classes.name: ListingArgs
classes.description: Represents optional category slug for initial product filtering on Listing screen.

classes.name: ProductArgs
classes.description: Wraps a Book object to be passed to ProductDetailScreen.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides route definitions and route generation logic for navigating within the app.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Getter returning a map of route names to their widget builder functions, handling argument extraction.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Factory method that creates routes with robust argument parsing, used for dynamic route handling.
